ygData.subject: Re: Treant Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... but the faction covers the animals (wolves and bears) and the unkempt druids are still one with nature so killing them still pisses off the animals... i
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 16 Jan 2000, Joe Wallace wrote:
> Pine goes UP, which makes sense, but QRG Protected Animals goes DOWN. This
> made no sense to me, since QRG stands for Qeynos Rangers Guild, and I cannot
> see why you would lose faction with them for killing the evil unkempt
> druids. Anyhow, unless they fixed this when they made the unkempts more

but the faction covers the animals (wolves and bears) and the unkempt
druids are still "one with nature" so killing them still pisses off the
animals...

i wouldn't worry too much about that one though, since unless your a
ranger or a druid you are already kos to the animals anyway...


Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
